title: 2 South Shore beaches closed after white shark-seal ‘interaction’
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News A photo shared by Plymouth police on Facebook showed the aftermath of the attack off of Manomet Point.
By Madison Lucchesi September 15, 2025 | 9:54 AM Less than a minute to read 1Share ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Two Plymouth beaches are closed after a white shark attacked a seal, police said.

title: Mike Vrabel critiqued NFL replay review and joked about his sideline sprint after first Patriots’ win
author: Hayden Bird
bullets: Patriots "Hopefully, this trend of these linemen false starting and then patting each other on the back after the game can end.
" Mike Vrabel talks to Drake Maye during the Patriots' win in Miami against the Dolphins.

title: What is Marshmallow Fluff? A guide to the iconic New England spread.
author: Frances Klemm
bullets: Wickedpedia From its invention in Somerville to the Fluffernutter craze, here’s everything to know about the sticky-sweet New England staple.

title: In biggest start of his Red Sox career, ace Garrett Crochet keeps Boston afloat in playoff race
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Red Sox “As we're nearing the end here, I don't want to have any regret on my mind here in a couple weeks.
" Garrett Crochet struck out 12 Yankees over six innings of work on Sunday.
(Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff) By Conor Ryan September 15, 2025 | 7:28 AM 3 minutes to read Garrett Crochet brushed aside talk of the stakes involving Sunday’s start against the Yankees.

title: 3 arrested at Burlington ICE office trying to deliver supplies to detainees
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News The ICE Boston Field Office is an office building now doubling as a detention center with multiple allegations of poor conditions.
Burlington, MA- 6/26/25- The ICE Boston Field Office at 1000 District Ave in Burlington, MA is currently doubling as an immigrant detention center.
Heather Diehl for the Boston Globe ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Red Sox deliver early knockout punch with 6-run inning to salvage series with Yankees
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Red Sox “Put up six-spot — feels like a million with Crochet going.
" Carlos Narvaez's home run punctuated Boston's six-run first inning.
(AP Photo/Jim Davis) By Conor Ryan September 14, 2025 3 minutes to read The Red Sox didn’t have a single player cross home plate after the first inning on Sunday night against the Yankees.

title: Mike Vrabel defends Patriots kicker Andy Borregales after another shaky outing vs. Dolphins
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Patriots “You’ve got to have a lot of confidence in him, and I do have a lot of confidence.
It didn't waver.
" Andy Borregales has had an up-and-down showing so far this season with the Patriots.

title: Seth Moulton says he’s received ‘violent threats’ after asking Trump to condemn political violence
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Politics In the wake of Charlie Kirk's death, Moulton called on Trump to condemn political violence.
"Let's be serious about where this violence is coming from," he said on CNN.
Congressman Seth Moulton speaks during a town hall event at Tewksbury High School on June 16, 2025, in Tewksbury.

title: What Antonio Gibson told himself before his 90-yard fourth-quarter touchdown
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Patriots "I was talking to myself before the play, like man, make a play right here AG.

I asked and received" Antonio Gibson broke free for a 90-yard TD Barry Chin/Globe Staff Antonio Gibson smiled and rubbed his face as he was asked about the 90-yard kick return he ran back for a touchdown during the Patriots’ 33-27 win against the Dolphins on Sunday afternoon.
The Patriots were in need of a big play after giving up a 74-yard punt return to Miami on the previous drive.

title: 2025 Emmy Awards: Full list of winners, including ‘The Studio,’ ‘Adolescence’
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Entertainment Here is a full list of winners and nominees at the 2025 Emmys, including top winners like "The Pitt," "Adolescence," and "The Studio.
" Tramell Tillman accepts the award for outstanding supporting actor in a drama series for "Severance" during the 77th Primetime Emmy Awards on Sunday at the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles.
Chris Pizzello/AP The 2025 Emmy Awards were all about getting the winners announced as quickly as possible.
